abstract: Federation of Protestant Welfare Agencies, one of seven agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Cimeron DuBose of Harlem buy new furniture.
lead_paragraph: After Cimeron DuBose lost part of her eyesight, she focused on taking care of her loved ones. Then she and two other family members learned they had cancer.

headline.main: Battling Blindness and a Family Health Crisis, but Seeing Hope
headline.print_headline: Losing Sight in One Eye but Still Finding a Purpose

snippet: After Cimeron DuBose lost part of her eyesight, she focused on taking care of her loved ones. Then she and two other family members learned they had cancer.
